tables.name: stride_block_events
tables.description: This table contains block-level events from the Cosmos ecosystem, capturing system events that occur at the block level rather than within individual transactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifier for each block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created in the blockchain

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index of the event within the message or transaction

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event occurring on the blockchain

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: JSON object containing event attributes

columns.name: source
columns.description: Source of the event data

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version of the data schema

tables.name: stride_blocks
tables.description: This table provides information about blocks created in the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains details such as block height, timestamp, validators, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifier for each block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Identifier for the specific blockchain network within the Cosmos ecosystem

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: Address of the validator responsible for proposing the block

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: Hash representing the consensus state of the validators at the time

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: Total size of the messages included in the block in bytes

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: Total number of transactions included in the block

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination or unit of the token

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Quantity of tokens transferred

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination or unit of the token

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: stride_delegate
tables.description: This table tracks delegation events in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing an overview of changes to the state of validators and their stakeholders.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifier for each block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique transaction hash identifier within the network

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Position of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within a message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account initiating the transaction

columns.name: validator
columns.description: Address of the validator participating in consensus

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Quantity of tokens transferred

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination or unit of the token

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: Updated shares for the delegator following the staking action

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: stride_ics20_receive
tables.description: This table tracks IBC (Inter-Blockchain Communication) receive transactions across the Cosmos ecosystem, enabling users to visualize and analyze IBC transfers.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created in the blockchain

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifier for each block in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique transaction hash identifier within the network

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Position of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index of the event within the message or transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within a message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account initiating the transaction

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: Address of the account receiving tokens

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Quantity of tokens transferred

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination or unit of the token

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: Route of token transfer between chains

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Optional note accompanying a transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: stride_redelegate
tables.description: Redelegation events in the Cosmos ecosystem track the transfer of validator delegations between validators, allowing for delegation rebalancing and optimizing staking efficiency.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifier for each block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique transaction hash identifier within the network

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Position of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within a message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account initiating the transaction

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Quantity of tokens transferred

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination or unit of the token

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the delegation action will be completed

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: stride_send
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Transactions - Overview of executed transactions, their timestamps, and token movements between accounts.

columns.description: Unique identifier for each block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique transaction hash identifier within the network

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Position of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within a message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account initiating the transaction

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: Address of the account receiving tokens

columns.name: token_amount

tables.name: stride_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transaction information from the Cosmos ecosystem, including their status, fees, and associated block information. It provides a comprehensive view of interactions within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifier for each block in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Identifier for the specific blockchain network within the Cosmos ecosystem

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction within a blockchain

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Detailed information about a transaction

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: Logs and events generated by a transaction

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Cost incurred by a sender for executing a transaction

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: Execution result of a transaction

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Position of the transaction within the block

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Total gas consumed by a transaction

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: Desired gas limit for transaction execution

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Optional note accompanying a transaction

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version of the data schema

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: Denomination and quantity of transaction fees

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: Account responsible for paying transaction fees

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: Account authorized to pay transaction fees

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: Maximum gas that a transaction is allowed to consume

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Indicates single-signature transaction type

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: Serialized multi-signature transaction data

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: Block height after which transactions become invalid

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created in the blockchain

tables.name: stride_undelegate
tables.description: This table tracks undelegation transactions in the Cosmos ecosystem. Undelegation occurs when a delegator withdraws their staked tokens from a validator.
